mapper.sql: RATIONID, SPOID, RATIONCOUNTS, FIRMID, OPERATIONDATE, RATIONLOAN, SERVICEFEE, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO, SALES_REBATERATIO, FIRMNAME, SALESID
mapper.insert: insert into IPO_SPO_RATION (RATIONID, SPOID, RATIONCOUNTS, FIRMID, OPERATIONDATE, RATIONLOAN, SERVICEFEE, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO, SALES_REBATERATIO, FIRMNAME, SALESID) values (#{rationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rationcounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rationloan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{servicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salesAllocationratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salesRebateratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IPO_SPO_RATION set SPOID = #{spoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RATIONCOUNTS = #{rationcounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATIONDATE = #{operationdate,jdbcType=DATE}, RATIONLOAN = #{rationloan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SERVICEFEE = #{servicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO = #{salesAllocationratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALES_REBATERATIO = #{salesRebateratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIRMNAME = #{firmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALESID = #{salesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RATIONID = #{rationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select RATIONID, SPOID, RATIONCOUNTS, FIRMID, OPERATIONDATE, RATIONLOAN, SERVICEFEE, SALES_ALLOCATIONRATIO, SALES_REBATERATIO, FIRMNAME, SALESID from IPO_SPO_RATION where RATIONID = #{rationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select * from ( select from IPO_SPO_RATION where 1=1
) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum} order by a.spo_id
